txt.en: Lake-town citizens are milling about in front of the manor
Something is amiss in Lake-town.\n\nYou should talk to the guard at the Master's manor.
Mervárth can be found near the Master's manor.\n\nYou should talk to Mervárth.
You hear a familiar whistle from somewhere nearby
Something is amiss in Lake-town.\n\nYou should make your way to the Master's manor.
Make your way to the Master's manor

'You are welcome in Lake-town, [placeholder], but I'm afraid you have come at a bad time. It's a delicate situation; if you must know, you shall have to go to the Master's manor and see for yourself.'
Talk to the guard at the Master's manor

'[placeholder]! Good to see you again. You seem to have a knack for showing up where things have gotten interesting! \n\n'It does seem our dear old Master of Lake-town has died, but those guards are being awfully tight-lipped about the cause. He was the very picture of health just yesterday! And then there's a rumour going around that he was murdered....'
You have just arrived at Lake-town, but it seems something is amiss. Make your way to the Master's manor to find out what happened.
